!Trader Janne: Hello! Come in! Do you need a nice, sharp long sword? Or how about a shiny iron helmet or armor? Ask me for anything! Oh, that man over there? He's my father, a man of great strength. He still carries heavy merchandise with his own hands. He doesn't trust young people nowadays...
